title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.19 - Time for filing of petition to review order, determination, or rule or regulation of Commissioner of Labor
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.19 - Time for filing of petition to review order, determination, or rule or regulation of Commissioner of Labor

State Regulations
(a) Unless otherwise provided by statute, rule or regulation, a petition for review of an order, determination, rule or
regulation issued by the Commissioner must be filed with the Board within 60
days after the date the order, determination, rule or regulation was
issued. (b) Statutes of limitations
for filing a petition cannot be extended by the Board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.19

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
